text: The 2017 Remus F3 Cup was the 36th Austria Formula 3 Cup season and the fifth Remus F3 Cup season. ==Teams and drivers== All Cup cars were built between 2008 and 2011, while Trophy cars were built between 1992 and 2007. Numbers used at Remus F3 Cup events listed; numbers used at races run to F2 Italian Trophy and/or MSV F3 Cup regulations displayed in tooltips. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! Team ! align=center| | 3–4, 6–7 |- | Paolo Brajnik | Dallara F308 | Volkswagen-Spiess | 212 | Paolo Brajnik | align=center| | 1–3, 6 |- |} ==Calendar & Race results== Round 2, 4 and 7 (Imola, Spa-Francorchamps and Mugello) were held together with the F2 Italian Trophy. The MSV F3 Cup joined both series at Spa-Francorchamps. However, neither Italian F2 Trophy drivers nor MSV F3 Cup competitors were eligible to score Remus F3 Cup points. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%" ! ! ! Circuit ! Date ! Pole Position !
